pyphy module¶

pyphy.getAllNameByTaxid(taxid)[source]¶

get taxonomic names and synonyms given a taxid

Parameters

taxid (str or int) – query taxid

Returns

return a list taxonomic names and synonyms if it is found otherwise unknown

Return type

list

pyphy.getAllSonsByTaxid(taxid)[source]¶

get the sons of all levels given a taxid

Parameters

taxid (str or int) – query taxid

Returns

return a list of son taxid if it is found otherwise an empty list

Return type

list

pyphy.getDictPathByTaxid(taxid)[source]¶

get the taxonomic path with the ranks as keys given a taxid

Parameters

taxid (str or int) – query taxid

Returns

return a dict of rank: parent taxid if it is found otherwise an empty dict

Return type

dict

pyphy.getRankByName(name, synonym=True)[source]¶

get the rank given a taxonomic name or a synonym

Parameters

  • name (str) – query taxonomic name

  • synonym (bool, optional) – should a synonym search be performed

Returns

the rank of the name if found otherwise no_rank

Return type

str

get the rank given a taxid

Returns

the rank of the taxid

pyphy.getTaxidByName(name, limit=1, synonym=True)[source]¶

get taxid given a taxonomic name or a synonym

Parameters

  • name (str) – query taxonomic name

  • limit (int, optional) – how many taxid to return

  • synonym (bool, optional) – should a synonym search be performed

Returns

return a list of taxid if the name is found otherwise a list of unknown

Return type

list
